thread.title: Why Babies Might Benefit From Looking Like Their Dads

author: Alina Dizik
title: Why Babies Might Benefit From Looking Like Their Dads
text:
Looking like your father could be good for your health. At least for the first year of your life.
A new study found that when a baby lives only with the mother, fathers who see a resemblance to themselves spend more time with the infant in the first year, which corresponds with better health at the child’s first birthday compared with babies whose fathers did not see a resemblance.
“Fathers...
